de.uniheidelberg.cl.swp.testacr
Class Evaluation

java.lang.Object
  de.uniheidelberg.cl.swp.testacr.Evaluation

public class Evaluation
extends java.lang.Object

This class handles the comparison and evaluation of acr outputs according to a given Gold Standard.
See Documentation for more details on how to use this class.

Evaluation modes:
There are currently two main evaluation methods implemented, see Evaluation.Mode for details.

Nested Class Summary
static class Evaluation.Mode
          Specifies the evaluation mode to be used.

Constructor Detail

Evaluation

public Evaluation()
Initialize an evaluation process for an ACR system. As a default, MUC6 is used as Evaluation Evaluation.Mode.

Method Detail

evaluateCorefPairs

public double evaluateCorefPairs(java.util.List<CoreferencePair> acrCorefPairs,
                                 java.util.List<CoreferencePair> goldCorefPairs)
Evaluate acrEntities in respect to a List of CoreferencePairs from the gold Standard. Computes both the precision and the recall.

Parameters:
acrCorefPairs - Predictions by the ACR system being evaluated.
goldCorefPairs - Gold standard = correct CoreferencePairs.
Returns:
Recall of the system, (correctly classified / CoreferencePairs in goldStandard)

evaluateFeatureDep

public double evaluateFeatureDep(java.util.List<CoreferencePair> acrCorefPairs,
                                 java.util.List<CoreferencePair> goldCorefPairs)
Evaluate acrEntities in respect to a List of CoreferencePairs from the gold Standard, filtering out CoreferencePairs which do not match the required feature values.

Parameters:
acrCorefPairs -
goldCorefPairs -
Returns:
Recall of the system, (correctly classified / CoreferencePairs in goldStandard)

findCorrespondingCorefPair

public static boolean findCorrespondingCorefPair(CoreferencePair prediciton,
                                                 java.util.List<CoreferencePair> goldStandard)
Determines whether there is a correspondence between a predicted CoreferencePair and the List of CoreferencePairs in the gold standard.

Parameters:
prediciton - The prediction which should be evaluated.
goldStandard - The list of CoreferencePair extracted from the gold standard.
Returns:
True if there is a corresponding CoreferencePair false otherwise.
